attributes.action: Do not add Fluoride to the drinking water.
attributes.additional_details: This is a blanket action that is unnecessary.
attributes.background: There is no pertinent reason to add fluoride to the drinking water supply. The reason given to prevent tooth cavities is moot as nearly every toothpaste has fluoride in it.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action:

Do not put fluoride in all tap water.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597714
